snippet.title: Beyond The Evil -  The Prologue Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello Everyone! We're happy to share to everyone our new game!
Game Info:
BEYOND THE EVIL
------------
Genre: Thriller/Horror/Puzzle
Launch Date: To Be Announced (Probable 2022).
------------
BEYOND THE EVIL Official Pages:
Gamejolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/beyondtheevil/616828
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1676050/BEYOND_THE_EVIL/?beta=1
Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/wcnPScbg2S
-----------
On June 30, the people who have more than 1000 followers on any social media will be able to play one short test of the prologue. Just ask in the chats of our discord server.
#horror #thriller #puzzle
